name: Shadow's Guise
description:
Shadow's Guise is a Occult Mystery Visual Novel based in 1920's London. 

Credits

Aiden Clae: Head Writer, Prologue, Chapter 1, 6, and 7 writer
Rawlin Stone: Chapter 2 writer
Evan Cheng: Chapter 3 writer
Heather Laughlin: Chapter 4 writer

Victor Zhour: Chapter 6 writer, programmer
